content:
However, <color=#8AAB4B>{homestar} Road</color>
was the first bubble universe where I decided
to truly make a life for myself.
info: 幻雪赏月会后的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content: Sometimes, a single choice can make all the difference, and we might never know when we miss an opportunity with someone... How mysterious~.
info: 幻雪赏月会后的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I cannot resist the allure of mysterious things,
Like a moth drawn to flame,
Curiosity is perhaps both my trait... and my weakness.
info: 幻雪赏月会后的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
What does it truly mean to "live well"?
Who has the right to define that?
When you think about it, isn't it enough if you find it worthwhile yourself?
info: 幻雪赏月会后的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Don't overwork yourself too much~
Mobai and Sani would be worried about you.
info: 幻雪赏月会后的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content: Life is full of mysterious coincidences—like our meeting in this very moment, the time we both left home and the paths we chose to take...
info: 幻雪赏月会后的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
<color=#8AAB4B>{homestar} Road</color>, <color=#8AAB4B>{homestar} Road</color>...
Naming something is quite the conundrum,
One must consider both timing and context, as well as its origins.
info: 幻雪赏月会后的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
My teacher at the Academia once said,
"Knowing many truths doesn't necessarily mean one can live life well."
It sounds profound, and yet...
info: 幻雪赏月会后的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
But then there are names like our "World Bubble,"
that just pop into existence with a flash of inspiration,
unique and free-spirited - quite fascinating, yip~
info: 幻雪赏月会后的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Your body always knows before you do when your spirit is running low.
How fascinating! For instance, the Faintglow on my tail... it's dimming!
I suppose that's my cue to get some rest.
info: 幻雪赏月会后的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I rarely feel anxious about unfamiliar places,
perhaps due to my extensive traveling experience.
info: 幻雪赏月会后的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
